p:
Briefly, 50 μL of serum was mixed with 50 μL of 0.05% BHT, 400 μL of 0.44 M H 3PO 4, and 100 μL of 42 Mm TBA. The mixture was vortexed and then heated in a boiling water bath for 1 hour. After cooling at 0 °C for 5 minutes, 250 μL of n-butanol was added to the mixture, vortexed, and then centrifuged at 14000 rpm for 5 minutes. The absorbance of the supernatant was measured at 532 nm.
13
